GYRE-lc

GYRE-lc is a Python library for the production of synthetic light curves for pulsating binary systems. It requires at least one MESA stellar model and its corresponding GYRE#1 pulsation model as inputs. A model spectrum is also requiredâ€“ GYRE-lc works best with MSG#2 interpolated spectra for speed, ease of use, accuracy, and reliability, but it also takes SYNSPEC#3 spectra in a custom HDF5 format.

Note

This project is under active development.
